fabfile Module¶

fabfile Module¶

Fabric’s own fabfile.

fabfile.code_version_is_tagged()[source]¶
fabfile.commits_since_tag()[source]¶

Has any work been done since the last tag?

fabfile.update_code_version(force)[source]¶

Update version data structure in-code and commit that change to git.

Normally, if the version file has not been modified, we abort assuming the user quit without saving. Specify force=yes to override this.
